casebody.data:
David L. SMITH, on behalf of himself and all others similarly situated
v.
STATE of North Carolina, Gov. Pat McCrory, Wake County Superior Court, and Judge Donald W. Stephens. No. 580P05-13. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. David Lee Smith, for Smith, David Lee. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 10th of June 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 2nd of July 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
